title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The statistic illustrates the Minutes of Age Group in the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in .
In that year , the Minutes of Daily 15-24 Spent Age amounted to 150 .
gold: Chart depicts the average time spent on social media daily in Maputo and the difference between age groups . \\n The age group 45 - 54 had the highest amount of minutes spent at around 150 minutes . \\n Whereas age groups 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 were the lowest at around 75 minutes .
